name: Kosmos Energy Ltd.
bossPosition: Chief Executive Officer and Chairman of the Board of Directors
goal: Kosmos is a premier international oil and gas exploration and production company focused on the frontier. Our primary areas of operation are underexplored regions along the Atlantic Margin. We focus on unlocking new hydrocarbon systems and growing and maturing discovered basins through follow-on exploration success, development and production.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture
euInitiatives:
- EU energy policy
- EU fisheries policy
- EU policy with regard to the Mediterranean region & Western Africa
- EU Annual Report on Human Rights
